request.schema: [{"name":"idempotency_token","label":"Idempotency token","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Case identifier (UUID)"},{"name":"guest_email","label":"Guest email","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Guest email address (resolves to contact_id for changing guest)"},{"name":"room_number","label":"Room number","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Hotel room number (resolves to room_id for changing room)"},{"name":"type","label":"Type","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case type (e.g., Housekeeping, Maintenance)"},{"name":"priority","label":"Priority","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case priority (e.g., Low, Medium, High, Urgent)"},{"name":"status","label":"Status","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case status (e.g., New, In Progress, Closed)"},{"name":"subject","label":"Subject","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case subject line"},{"name":"description","label":"Description","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Detailed description"},{"name":"origin","label":"Origin","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Case origin (e.g., Web, Phone, Email, Internal)"}]
